title: NEXT Program Undergoes Expansion
text:
Last updated: 05:30 PM ET, Fri July 24 2015 NEXT Program Undergoes Expansion Travel Agent | Claudette Covey | July 24, 2015 
Photo courtesy of Thinkstock 
NEXT, the initiative launched by Tzell Travel Group and Protravel International to recruit new agent talent, is undergoing an expansion with an additional trainer and a permanent classroom offering larger, more frequent classes on a set schedule in 2016. < Do you want to read the full story? You must be a registered travel professional with an active account to view the full story. Are you a Travel Agent? Log in to your account now, or register for free!
